A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Loved the movie. These haters out there are ridiculous. It was great to see Star Wars not follow the same direction as The Force Awakens. By the way\, these haters hated on that movie because it was the same as the original Star Wars. Sure this movie has the same issues that all movies suffer from in underdeveloped characters and scenes\, but in general it was fun and it was a great seconds showing off all the new characters that young people love. If you're older don't hate this Star Wars because it takes a new direction. Welcome the fact that we are not watching a remade Empire Strikes Back. That was the best Star Wars ever\, but we didn't need to watch it again. I really liked the different direction on Star Wars because it sets itself apart now from the original trilogy. Now were charting a new path in the Star Wars universe and it's truly exciting. The old characters can't live forever and this series was never about them. It was always about giving them a welcome goodbye.
